msItem.title: Dīvān-i Ḥāfiẓ
دیوان حافظ
msItem.note: The initial entry is written in the Library copy of Codrington. First flyleaf, verso: Signature of Andrew Gleed?, Edinburgh 1828, in pencil. Second flyleaf, recto: a) Signatures of Donald Macpherson, in Roman script, Astrachan Jany 13th 1820; faintly in pencil, Astrachan 7 Jany? year obscure; in Cyrillic script, dated Astrakhan December 13/25 1819. b) Note of Macpherson's ownership, in Persian, by the scribe of the MS. Written in distress and haste at the request of the choice Christian Donald Macpherson, resident in Astrakhan.

layoutDesc.p: 14 lines to the page in double column

bindingDesc.p: European style brown leather binding with tooled decoration. One cover detached, the other loose. Spine in poor condition.

origin.p: Astrakhan. Last day of Safar A.H. 1235 (17 December 1819).

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
